src\\xp_management.mc.data\\xp_management\\functions\\load.mcf:
scoreboard objectives add craXPBot.dummy dummy
advancement revoke @a only xp_management:try_to_bottle_xp
src\\xp_management.mc.data\\xp_management\\functions\\restore_:
setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:enchanting_table
data modify block ~ ~ ~ {} set from entity @s Item.tag.craXPBotData
kill @s
execute as @e[type=minecraft:item_frame,tag=craXPBot.enchTable] at @s positioned ~ ~-1000 ~ run function xp_management:restore_enchanting_table
scoreboard players remove #steps craXPBot.dummy 1
execute if block ~ ~ ~ minecraft:enchanting_table run function xp_management:check_enchanting_table
execute unless score #steps craXPBot.dummy matches 0 positioned ^ ^ ^0.1 run function xp_management:raycast
src\\xp_management.mc.data\\xp_management\\functions\\bottle_x:
clear @s minecraft:glass_bottle 1
give @s minecraft:experience_bottle
xp add @s -12 points
playsound minecraft:item.bottle.fill_dragonbreath player @a ~ ~ ~ 1 1.25
scoreboard players set #steps craXPBot.dummy 50
execute anchored eyes positioned ^ ^ ^ run function xp_management:raycast
tag @s remove craXPBot.continue
src\\xp_management.mc.data\\xp_management\\functions\\try_to_b:
advancement revoke @s only xp_management:try_to_bottle_xp
tag @s add craXPBot.continue
execute store result score #points craXPBot.dummy run xp query @s points
execute if score #points craXPBot.dummy matches ..4 if entity @s[level=1] run tag @s remove craXPBot.continue
execute if entity @s[tag=craXPBot.continue] run function xp_management:bottle_xp
